original_title: Former Navy Chief Daya Sandagiri joins SJB
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st);  Daya Sandagiri, the 14th Naval Commander of Sri Lanka, has joined the opposition Samagi Jana Balawegaya and pledged support for leader Sajith Premadasa.
Premadasa, recognizing Sandagiri's maritime expertise, appointed him as a consultant on maritime and naval policies.
